org.apache.felix.ipojo.dependency.impl

Class ServiceReferenceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.dependency.impl.ServiceReferenceUtils

  • public class ServiceReferenceUtils
extends Object
    Some utility methods to handle service references.

      Checks whether a list of service references contains a reference with the same service.id as the given reference.

      • ServiceReferenceUtils

        public ServiceReferenceUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • match

        public static boolean match(Filter filter,
            ServiceReference ref)
        Checks if the given service reference match the current filter. This method aims to avoid calling Filter.match(org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference) method when manipulating a composite reference. In fact, this method thrown a ClassCastException on Equinox.
        Parameters:
        ref - the service reference to check.
        Returns:
        true if the service reference matches.

      • containsReferenceById

        public static boolean containsReferenceById(List<? extends ServiceReference> references,
                            ServiceReference ref)
        Checks whether a list of service references contains a reference with the same service.id as the given reference.
        Parameters:
        references - the list of reference
        ref - the reference
        Returns:
        true if references contains a reference with the same service.id as ref.

      • getServiceReferenceById

        public static ServiceReference getServiceReferenceById(List<? extends ServiceReference> references,
                                       ServiceReference ref)
        Gets a service reference with the same service.id as the given reference from the given list.
        Parameters:
        references - the list of references
        ref - the reference
        Returns:
        the service reference from references having the same service.id as ref. null if there is no such reference in the list.

      • haveSameProperties

        public static boolean haveSameProperties(ServiceReference ref1,
                         ServiceReference ref2)
        Checks whether the two references has the same properties and their value are equals.
        Parameters:
        ref1 - first reference
        ref2 - second reference
        Returns:
        true if the two references have the same properties and their values are equals.

      • haveSameServiceId

        public static boolean haveSameServiceId(ServiceReference ref1,
                        ServiceReference ref2)
        Checks whether two service references have the same service id.
        Parameters:
        ref1 - first reference
        ref2 - second reference
        Returns:
        true if the two references have the same service.id, false otherwise.
